text: Plaion is a German-Austrian media company with the headquarter in HÃ¶fen, Tyrol, Austria. The company was founded in 1994 by Franz Koch and Klemens Kundratitz. In November 2020, Koch Media acquired Flying Wild Hog. Koch Media opened a new publishing division, Prime Matter, in June 2021. It operates in Munich. ==References== Category:Companies of Austria Category:Companies of Germany Category:1994 establishments in Europe
